---
name: Maintenance report
about: Suggest maintenance or housekeeping improvements
title: 'Maintenance: '
labels: ['maintenance', 'needs-triage', 'priority-medium']
assignees: ''
---

## Maintenance Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task or improvement.

## Current Issues
Describe any current problems or technical debt this maintenance addresses.

## Proposed Changes
Detail the specific maintenance work to be done:

### Code Improvements
- [ ] Refactoring
- [ ] Performance optimization
- [ ] Dependency updates
- [ ] Security patches
- [ ] Documentation updates

### Housekeeping
- [ ] Remove unused code/dependencies
- [ ] Update configuration files
- [ ] Clean up test files
- [ ] Update development tools
- [ ] Other housekeeping tasks

## Impact Assessment
How will this maintenance work benefit the project?
- Improved performance
- Better security
- Easier maintenance
- Updated dependencies
- Reduced technical debt
- Other benefits

## Testing Plan
How will you ensure the maintenance work doesn't break existing functionality?

## Time Estimate
Approximately how long will this maintenance take?
- [ ] Less than 1 hour
- [ ] 1-4 hours
- [ ] 4-8 hours
- [ ] More than 8 hours

## Priority
How urgent is this maintenance?
- [ ] Low - Can be done anytime
- [ ] Medium - Should be done soon
- [ ] High - Important for stability
- [ ] Critical - Blocking other work

## Additional Context
Add any other context about the maintenance work here.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have tested the changes locally
- [ ] I have considered the impact on existing features
- [ ] I have updated documentation if necessary
- [ ] I have considered rollback procedures
